languages.text: {n}Два звонких хлопка ладоней эхом отражаются от древних стен палубы. Шепот стихает.{/n} "Мы — нити, протянутые во мраке. И здесь, чтоб служить тебе. Если свой долг мы исполним, отступившись от таинств сакрального смертоубийства... Мы отступимся".
languages.translation_comment:
Кибелла
+1 к Kibellah_Humility
- финалится этюд DeathCultActive
- стартуеэ этюд DeathcultKillingRestriction

Кибелла
+1 к Kibellah_Humility
- финалится этюд DeathCultActive
- стартуеэ этюд DeathcultKillingRestriction

languages.text: {n}Kibellah claps her hands twice. The sound echoes off the ancient walls of the deck, and the cultists fall silent.{/n} "We are the threads that bind the darkness. We are here to serve you. If you command us to set aside the rites of sacred slaughter... then it is our duty to obey."
languages.original_text: {n}Два звонких хлопка ладоней эхом отражаются от древних стен палубы. Шепот стихает.{/n} "Мы — нити, протянутые во мраке. И здесь, чтоб служить тебе. Если свой долг мы исполним, отступившись от таинств сакрального смертоубийства... Мы отступимся".

traits.locale_text: {n}Two loud claps echo off the deck's ancient walls. The whispers die down.{/n} "We are threads stretched in darkness. And we are here to serve you. If doing our duty requires that we stray from the rites of sacred slaughter... Then stray we shall."

{n}Two loud claps echo off the deck's ancient walls. The whispers die down.{/n} "We are threads stretched in darkness. And we are here to serve you. If doing our duty requires that we stray from the rites of sacred slaughter... Then stray we shall."

{n}Kibellah claps her hands twice. The sound echoes off the ancient walls of the deck, and the cultists fall silent.{/n} "We are the threads that bind the darkness. We are here to serve you. If you command us to set aside the rites of sacred slaughter... then it is our duty to obey."

{n}Kibellah claps her hands twice. The sound echoes off the ancient walls of the deck, and the cultists fall silent.{/n} "We are the threads that bind the darkness. We are here to serve you. If you command us to set aside the rites of sacred slaughter... then it is our duty to obey."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah tape deux fois dans ses mains. Le son se répercute sur les murs du pont et immédiatement, les cultistes font silence.{/n} « Nous sommes les fils qui lient les ténèbres. Nous sommes ici pour vous servir. Si vous nous ordonnez d'abandonner les rites d'exécution sacrée... alors, il est de notre devoir d'obéir. »
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah claps her hands twice. The sound echoes off the ancient walls of the deck, and the cultists fall silent.{/n} "We are the threads that bind the darkness. We are here to serve you. If you command us to set aside the rites of sacred slaughter... then it is our duty to obey."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah tape deux fois dans ses mains. Le son se répercute sur les murs du pont et immédiatement, les cultistes font silence.{/n} « Nous sommes les fils qui lient les ténèbres. Nous sommes ici pour vous servir. Si vous nous ordonnez d'abandonner les rites d'exécution sacrée... alors, il est de notre devoir d'obéir. »

languages.text: {n}Kibellah da dos palmadas. El sonido se hace eco en los antiguos muros de la cubierta, y los sectarios se quedan en silencio.{/n} «Somos los hilos que atan las tinieblas. Estamos aquí para servirl{mf|e|a}. Si nos ordena cesar los ritos del asesinato sagrado... nuestro deber es obedecer».
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah claps her hands twice. The sound echoes off the ancient walls of the deck, and the cultists fall silent.{/n} "We are the threads that bind the darkness. We are here to serve you. If you command us to set aside the rites of sacred slaughter... then it is our duty to obey."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kibellah da dos palmadas. El sonido se hace eco en los antiguos muros de la cubierta, y los sectarios se quedan en silencio.{/n} «Somos los hilos que atan las tinieblas. Estamos aquí para servirl{mf|e|a}. Si nos ordena cesar los ritos del asesinato sagrado... nuestro deber es obedecer».

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈拍了两下手，声音在甲板古老的墙壁上回响，所有信徒都安静了下来。{/n}“我们是潜伏在黑暗中的丝线，我们来这里是为了服侍你。既然你命令我们舍弃神圣的杀戮仪式……那我们有责任服从命令。”
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah claps her hands twice. The sound echoes off the ancient walls of the deck, and the cultists fall silent.{/n} "We are the threads that bind the darkness. We are here to serve you. If you command us to set aside the rites of sacred slaughter... then it is our duty to obey."

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈拍了两下手，声音在甲板古老的墙壁上回响，所有信徒都安静了下来。{/n}“我们是潜伏在黑暗中的丝线，我们来这里是为了服侍你。既然你命令我们舍弃神圣的杀戮仪式……那我们有责任服从命令。”

languages.text: {n}キベラは手を二回叩いた。その音がデッキの古びた壁に反響し、カルト信者たちは沈黙した。{/n}「私たちは闇を束ねる糸です。私たちは、あなたに仕えるためにここにやってきました。神聖な屠殺の儀式を脇に置くようお命じになれば…従うことこそ、私たちの義務です」
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah claps her hands twice. The sound echoes off the ancient walls of the deck, and the cultists fall silent.{/n} "We are the threads that bind the darkness. We are here to serve you. If you command us to set aside the rites of sacred slaughter... then it is our duty to obey."

traits.locale_text: {n}キベラは手を二回叩いた。その音がデッキの古びた壁に反響し、カルト信者たちは沈黙した。{/n}「私たちは闇を束ねる糸です。私たちは、あなたに仕えるためにここにやってきました。神聖な屠殺の儀式を脇に置くようお命じになれば…従うことこそ、私たちの義務です」

languages.text: {n}Kibellah klatscht zweimal in die Hände. Das Geräusch hallt von den uralten Wänden des Decks wider, und die Kultisten verstummen.{/n} "Wir sind die Fäden, welche die Dunkelheit zusammenbinden. Wir sind hier, um Euch zu dienen. Wenn Ihr uns befehlt, die Riten des heiligen Gemetzels zu übergehen ... dann ist es unsere Pflicht, zu gehorchen."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah claps her hands twice. The sound echoes off the ancient walls of the deck, and the cultists fall silent.{/n} "We are the threads that bind the darkness. We are here to serve you. If you command us to set aside the rites of sacred slaughter... then it is our duty to obey."

languages.text: {n}Kibellah iki kez el çırpıyor. Çıkan ses, güvertenin kadim duvarlarında yankılanıyor. Tarikatçılar sessizliğe bürünüyor.{/n} "Karanlığı bir arada tutan ipliğiz biz. Burada görevimiz sana hizmet etmektir. Madem kutsal katliam ayinlerini bir kenara bırakmamızı emrediyorsun... O hâlde vazifemizde itaat etmek vardır."
languages.original_text: {n}Kibellah claps her hands twice. The sound echoes off the ancient walls of the deck, and the cultists fall silent.{/n} "We are the threads that bind the darkness. We are here to serve you. If you command us to set aside the rites of sacred slaughter... then it is our duty to obey."
